Reviews.Title: IF THE DEAL FITS
Reviews.Author: Derell Smith `
Reviews.Content: HEY THIS IS A GREAT DEAL. I AM SO PLEASED WITH MY DECISION. I URGE ANYONE SHOPPING AROUND TO NOT PASS THIS UP AS IT HAS EVERYTHING YOU NEED FOR THE RIGHT PRICE FROM THE RIGHT PLACE. I REPLACED THE BAG BUT THE REST IS SOLID.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens + <2> Canon EF 75-300mm III Lens + <3> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card +
<4> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <5> Spare LP-E10 Battery for Canon + <6> Battery Charger for LP-E10 +
<7> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <8> Additional Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <9> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <10> PD Digital SLR Camera Case +
<11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens with 75-300mm III Lens + 64GB Card + Case + Battery & Charger + Tripod + Tele/Wide Lens Kit
